instructions.1: Place ham, turkey, and mashed potatoes on a microwave-safe plate and cook in the microwave until heated through, about 2 minutes.
instructions.2: Lay out two slices of bread; place 4 slices of ham on each slice of bread.
instructions.3: Lay out remaining two slices of bread; place 1 slice of turkey on each slice of bread. Spread 1/2 the potatoes on top of each turkey slice. Place turkey slice of bread together with ham slice of bread to form sandwiches.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the turkey from Step 1 being used?
Is ham from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is turkey from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is bread from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is turkey from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 1?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the turkey in Step 3?
Can we lay (Step 2) and lay (Step 3) at the same time?
